lst.name: sentence
lst.str: McDonnell Douglas's Douglas Aircraft Co is working on two test planes, and a production award for up to 210 of the aircraft should be made by late 1989, a Douglas Aircraft spokesman said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It's a case of companies paying for things that in a different environment the Defense Department would have paid for," said Howard Mager of Donaldson Lufkin Jenrette Securities Corp.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Singer Co <SMF> and Northrop Corp <NOC> recently announced planned second quarter writeoffs related to costs of major defense programs under fixed-price government contracts.
